categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic squads

nodes.text: Skywalker's squad was a squad of clone jetpack troopers from the 501st Legion's Torrent Company. The squad was led by Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and Clone Captain CT-7567 "Rex" during the Battle of Christophsis. General Skywalker and the squad thinned the numbers of General Whorm Loathsom's army and fought three Octuptarra tri-droids.
Skywalker's squad first appeared in the 2008 film Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It was first identified in the 2017 reference guide Star Wars: On the Front Lines.
